title: System Operational Interface Standard (SOIS)
description: Defines mandatory schemas and interfaces for external system dependencies, required by SGS at S1 (Ingress) and S6 (Resource Check).

InputSchema.description: Reference to the mandatory data input schema defined in SDVM (S1). Must validate against current GVDM entry.

ResourceAllocation.description: Configuration for computational budget check (CAC) required at S6.

ExternalServices.description: Required external endpoints and their attested status for S4.5 context validation (ECVM dependencies).
